revised_title: Obituary of Sir John Cunningham McLennan: A Pioneering Physicist
tldr: The article is an obituary for Sir John Cunningham McLennan, a prominent Canadian physicist who made significant contributions to the fields of spectroscopy, cryogenics, and the study of the Aurora. McLennan was a skilled researcher, educator, and leader in the scientific community, with a career marked by numerous achievements and honors. His work on the spectra derived from the Aurora, as well as his development of a cryogenic laboratory at the University of Toronto, are among his most notable accomplishments.
